iti68:4.1: “Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, rāgo appahīno, doso appahīno, moho appahīno—
iti68:4.2: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘baddho mārassa paṭimukkassa mārapāso yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato’.
iti68:4.3: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, rāgo pahīno, doso pahīno, moho pahīno—
iti68:4.4: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘abaddho mārassa omukkassa mārapāso na yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato’”ti.
iti68:6.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
